IDBObjectStoreDelete.summary:
The delete() method of the
interface returns an object,
and, in a separate thread, deletes the specified record or records.

remarks.para:
Either a key or an can be passed, allowing one or multiple
records to be deleted from a store. To delete all records in a store, use
.

Bear in mind that if you are using a , you can use
the method to more efficiently delete the current
record â€” without having to explicitly look up the record's key.

IDBObjectStoreDelete.returns: An object on which subsequent events related to this operation are fired.If the operation is successful, the value of the request's property is undefined.
